description.en:
“I need you by my side, be my wife. Because you see me the way I am.” 
Rozemari is courted by Alphonse, a nobleman who is close to the king. While people who want to become Alphonse's bride are piled up like a mountain, Rozemari, chosen by him, is filled with joy. However, to make her more pleasing, Alphonse does not mind even if the servant is outside the door, and leaves Rozemari with hot caress. 
“You are now my own… .” The moment Rozemari, soaked with happiness, showed a little hesitation, Alphonse, who misunderstood her lack of affection, traps Rosemary in the room of the mansion...

[url=https://www.lezhin.com/ko/comic/sweet_cage]Official Korean Translation[/url]
